titles.title: Expressing the sense of the Congress that a series of postage stamps should be issued in recognition of the recipients of the Congressional Medal of Honor.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.

bill.summary: 10/23/2001--Introduced. Calls upon the Citizens' Stamp Advisory Committee to recommend and the U.S. Postal Service to issue a series of postage stamps in recognition of recipients of the Congressional Medal of Honor.
